abilities.description: Creates a complete duplicate of the user's entire body in another location. The clone can act independently while the real body remains safe elsewhere.
abilities.limitations: The clone appears to share damage or effects with the original body based on manga precedent.

weaknesses: Standard Devil Fruit weaknesses: seawater, Sea-Prism Stone, Haki

keyMoments.description: Robin debuts her Cuerpo Fleur technique, creating a full-body clone to stop Luffy and Jinbe's fight.
keyMoments.significance: First demonstration of Robin's enhanced post-timeskip Devil Fruit mastery.

abilities.description: Allows the user to separate their soul from their body, manifesting as a spectral form engulfed in spiritual flames. While in this state, the physical body cannot move and must be protected.
abilities.limitations: Cannot move or use the physical body while the soul is separated. The body is vulnerable to attack during separation.

weaknesses: Physical body is defenseless during soul separation

keyMoments.description: Brook reveals his ability to separate his soul from his skeleton body, demonstrating the true potential of the Yomi Yomi no Mi beyond just resurrection.
keyMoments.significance: Establishes Brook's soul manipulation abilities that expand the fruit's utility beyond its initial one-time resurrection power.

trivia.fact: Brook discovered this ability while praying during a slump in his musical career during the two-year timeskip.
Brook's soul appears as green spiritual flames in both the manga (Volume 64 cover) and anime, establishing visual consistency.
